Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: i saw 10-12 ufo's on river fishing,from 9;15-11;30pm
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Warren
There was one other sighting in Warren on or around June 30th 2011
divs: sighting detailsthis was amazing last night ,i was fishing,by myself,in warren,on alleghany river,across,just down from the refinery,at 9;17pm,i looked up,above the refinery,to the e,and i thought i saw what was the 1st star coming out last night,it was a awesome clear,star lit night last night,well,i watched this star a couple min,then it started to move slowly to the e,this shocked my,so,as i always do i flashed them the cross sign,whoever is flyin this ufo,with my led flashlight,to let them know i see them,the ufo,moved very slowly to the e ,in about 2 min it acclelerated fast and was gone,well five min later,i see a ufo appear above me,out of nowwhere and vanish,it was goin s to n,this was only like 10 secs,im startin to think,i wonder,if these ufo's r watchin me fish,well,at 9;30,its just startin to get dark,it was not total dark til 10;30,my view,is lookin to the n,from the s bank,i notice at 9;30,above me to ne,2 stars that look like they r coming out,i watched these for couple min,then the star on the right started to move slowly to the right,this amazed me that i saw another ufo,almost above me hovering,id say,about 1000ft,on other side of river above refinery,i pulled out my light,and gave them my cross -\flash sign,abt 30 sec later the star on the left started to move slowly to the rt also,then,came down fast towards me,it gained in size and brightness all of a sudden,about 5 times what it was,this gave me butterflies in my stomach,im thinkin ,they see me,,they flashed me back with their ship,and their comin down,!right then,it dimmed a bit slowed down,went back up to the right slowly.following his other ufo,buddy,and abt 30 sec later,going to the se they vanished,in 10 min a saw,3-4 other ufo's,come out of nowhere,in the same area,goin,se to n,and n to se,as if they were,watching me fish,also,at 9;35,i caught a nice 14 inch catfish,right after the ufo,what i think ,flashed me back,as i flashed him with my light,it was wierd,i counted about,10-12 ufo's,,i was hard to keep count,i was seein so many,from,9;15 to 11;30,cause,i saw a few,more,fling over warren,after the 1st seven,the last 5 were real high,goin,ne to sw,and s to n,these were all stars that looked to be moving,they were not shooting stars.,or planes,cause,i did see,abt,2-3 dozen planes also,flyin across,the sky,so these,ufo's,had to be seen by pilots,and radar,so in all i saw 4 ufo's hovering above me that started to move as if ,watchin me fish,and 1 of them,flashed me back with their ship,when they made it glow up bright when it started to come down towards me,this to me was very cool,its supposed to be cloudy tnight,dont know if i will see any,well thats my report, have a great 4th july...
